title: President, Let’s Get Divorced - Novel Updates
tags: Female Protagonist   Handsome Male Lead   Marriage
author: 青青子衿
description:
“You slept with me, so you have to be responsible for me!” 

Being drugged by a shameless client, Bai Luoxi forced herself upon a handsome and rich bachelor, and took his viginity. 

After that, Bai Luoxi plucked up her courage and said, “About what happened last night, I won’t take the responsibility…”

The man said in a cold voice, “Was I not good enough last night? Shall we do it one more time?” 

She would rather erase that night from her memory, while he became addicted to sleeping with her. So he swindled her to the get the marriage certificate. 

Women were getting in lines to pursue him, but Bai Luoxi couldn’t bear it, “Lu Shaolan, I want a divorce!” 

Mr. Lu answered, “Okay, but you should give birth to a dozen of children for me first.”>
